allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete platform rebranding and AWS deployment setup

## Branding Alignment
- Canonical brand name: "The Unified Health"
- UI shorthand: "Unified Health"  
- Domain: theunifiedhealth.com
- Updated 70+ files across frontend, backend, and infrastructure

## Changes
- Updated all frontend apps \(web, admin, mobile, provider-portal\)
- Updated email templates with new branding
- Updated i18n localization files
- Updated legal documents \(Privacy Policy, Terms of Service\)
- Updated API documentation \(OpenAPI specs\)
- Added branding.ts as single source of truth
- Added CI branding enforcement check

## AWS Infrastructure
- Added CodePipeline module for CI/CD
- Added Route53 outputs for GoDaddy nameserver config
- Updated providers for multi-region support
- Created deployment scripts \(deploy.sh, deploy.ps1\)
- Added DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md with step-by-step instructions

## Route53 Nameservers for GoDaddy
- ns-1969.awsdns-54.co.uk
- ns-574.awsdns-07.net
- ns-98.awsdns-12.com
- ns-1342.awsdns-39.org

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: Update terraform config and fix tag format

- Enable CodePipeline with GitHub connection
- Fix Compliance tag format \(use hyphen instead of comma\)
- Add CodePipeline IAM policy files

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement comprehensive UH design system with Healing Aurora theme

## Design System Components
- Created BrandLogo component with consistent branding across all pages
- Implemented UnifiedHealthDarkBackground for landing pages
- Implemented UnifiedHealthBrightBackground for interior pages
- Added LandingLayout and InteriorLayout components
- Created navigation components \(InteriorNavbar, Breadcrumb, PageHeader\)
- Added PricingCard components with dark/bright variants

## Styling Updates
- Updated globals.css with complete UH CSS variables
- Updated tailwind.config.js with UH design tokens
- Implemented "Healing Aurora" gradient system
- Added glass morphism effects and glow shadows
- Typography: 9/10pt italic body text support

## Pages Redesigned
- Landing page with premium dark aurora theme
- Login page with split dark/bright design
- Patient dashboard with new UH tokens
- Patient portal layout with sidebar navigation

## Key Features
- Dual-mode backgrounds \(dark landing, bright interior\)
- Consistent BrandLogo across all pages
- WCAG AA accessible color contrasts
- Responsive mobile-first layouts
- Animated aurora gradient effects

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Fix Docker builds for monorepo structure

- API: Copy Prisma generated client to production image
- Web: Fix standalone path for monorepo \(apps/web/server.js\)

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Correct Prisma client path in API Dockerfile

Copy generated Prisma client to dist/generated instead of generated
since the compiled code imports from ''../generated/client'' relative
to dist/lib/prisma.js.

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(for file in ci-tests.yml security-check.yml web-frontend-deploy.yml aws-provider-check.yml lighthouse-ci.yml sbom-generation.yml terraform-aws.yml terraform-dev-prod-gated.yml scheduled-production-deploy.yml terraform-drift-check.yml test-actions.yml)

Bash(repos="unified-health-prod/laboratory-service unified-health-prod/notification-service unified-health-prod/api unified-health-prod/pharmacy-service unified-health-prod/auth-service unified-health-prod/clinical-trials-service unified-health-prod/web-app unified-health-prod/chronic-care-service unified-health-prod/api-gateway unified-health-prod/admin-portal unified-health-prod/interoperability-service unified-health-prod/price-transparency-service unified-health-prod/mobile unified-health-prod/telehealth-service unified-health-prod/mental-health-service unified-health-prod/provider-portal unified-health-prod/imaging-service unified-health-prod/denial-management-service unified-health-prod/home-health-service unified-health-prod/population-health-service unified-health-prod/vendor-risk-service")
Bash(for repo in api auth-service notification-service pharmacy-service telehealth-service mental-health-service)
Bash(do echo "=== $repo ===" aws ecr describe-images --repository-name "$repo" --query 'imageDetails[*].[imageTags[0],imagePushedAt]' --output table)

Bash(for repo in unified-health-prod/api unified-health-prod/auth-service unified-health-prod/web-app unified-health-prod/telehealth-service unified-health-prod/api-gateway unified-health-prod/pharmacy-service)
